snippet: Democratic hopes to win control of the House hinge on gaining three or four seats there, and several of the party’s candidates have managed to maintain an advantage.
abstract: New York State is now a prime focus of the battle for control of Congress, as both parties concentrate their efforts and money on more than a half-dozen competitive districts; most independent analysts have predicted that Republicans will retain control of the House, and Democrats are strongly urging donors to turn their attention to these key Congressional races.
lead_paragraph: Democratic hopes to win control of the House hinge on gaining three or four seats there, and several of the party’s candidates have managed to maintain an advantage.

headline.seo: New York State Becomes a Focus of the Fight for Congress
headline.main: Competitive Races Put New York State in Thick of the Fight for Congress
headline.print_headline: Competitive Races Put New York State in Thick of the Fight for Congress
